mapper.select: SELECT teacher.t_name,teacher.t_img_src,course.c_id,course.c_name,course.c_img_src,school.sc_name FROM teacher_select_course,teacher,course,school WHERE teacher_select_course.t_id=#{id} AND teacher.t_id=teacher_select_course.t_id AND course.c_id=teacher_select_course.c_id AND school.sc_id=course.sc_id

SELECT course.c_id AS cId, course.c_name AS cName, teacher.t_name AS tName, course.c_img_src AS cImgSrc, #{sId} IN ( SELECT student_select_course.s_id FROM teacher_select_course, student_select_course WHERE teacher_select_course.c_id = #{cId} AND student_select_course.tsc_id = teacher_select_course.tsc_id) AS joined FROM course, teacher, teacher_select_course WHERE course.c_id = #{cId} AND teacher_select_course.c_id = course.c_id AND teacher.t_id = teacher_select_course.t_id
SELECT c_id AS cId, c_name AS cName, c_img_src AS cImgSrc FROM course WHERE c_id = #{cId}
SELECT count(*) FROM course WHERE course.c_id = #{cId} LIMIT 1
SELECT s.s_email FROM student s,teacher_select_course tsc,student_select_course ssc WHERE tsc.t_id=#{id} AND tsc.c_id=#{cId} AND ssc.tsc_id=tsc.tsc_id AND s.s_id=ssc.s_id GROUP BY s.s_id
